name: 2 Card War
description:
2 Card War is an extension of the classic card game War, that adds solid strategy and odds playing. While battling 1 computer opponent, you choose 2 cards out of your 5 card hand. If your 2 cards add up to a higher value than your opponent's, you win the cards. The game ends when 1 player has won all the cards. By using strategies like playing your low cards and your high cards separately, you can attempt to gradually win higher valued cards from your opponent than he wins from you. By keeping track of high cards your opponent has, you have a better chance of picking off his best while holding on to yours.

There are many configurable options including 3 Opponent AI Difficulty levels and the option to play with up to 4 decks. There are also several different ways to start the game from a Random shuffle, to an Even shuffle or an All or No Ace start.

Develop your own strategy by playing aggressive or cautiously.

For more information and a video demo, check out the official web site www.twistedinflux.com.
